column2: an A.M. Eatery////We frequent Snooze as this is our favorite brunch spot in Houston. The weight can be anywhere from 15 minutes to an hour
column3: coffee is offered during the wait free of charge. Service is always exceptional
column4: the RumMosa was pretty strong if that's what you're into
column5: the Mimosa has a good balance to it though the orange juice does have pulp. I order the corned beef hash each time
column6: it's fresh and full of potatoes. Eggs are eggs a but salt and pepper help. My wife ordered the spuds deluxe with ham and she ate all of it. All in all
